history.proof: intros H. unfold PSeries. qsimpl time: 1 use: PSeries_eq. qsimpl time: 1 use: PSeries_eq. apply Series_ext. qsimpl time: 1 use: PSeries_eq.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of PSeries_eq (PSeries _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of PSeries_eq (PSeries _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H1 : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), PSeries a x = Series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) a, b : nat -> R x : R H : forall n : nat, a n = b n Unable to unify "forall n : nat, a n = b n" with "forall n : nat, a n * x ^ n = b n * x ^ n".

original: intros H. unfold PSeries. rewrite PSeries_eq. rewrite PSeries_eq. apply Series_ext. apply H.
